begin.user_input:
Create a 15-second animated text promo video for Begin app.

Begin is a daily fortune and guidance app that gives you personalized recommendations across different life categories to guide what's best to do each day. It makes better predictions based on the journals you write every day.

Slogan: 晨启知今日 夜记向明天 (Morning insights for today, Evening notes for tomorrow)

I want:
- Bilingual content (English + Chinese) throughout the video
- Title "BEGIN" / "晨启" with gentle, elegant entrance
- Subtitle "Your Daily Guide & Journal" / "每日指南与日记" that fades in
- Feature highlight: "Personalized daily guidance" / "个性化每日指引"
- Feature highlight: "Journal-powered predictions" / "日记驱动的预测"
- Slogan "晨启知今日 夜记向明天" with English subtitle
- Light color palette with warm gradient backgrounds (sunrise/dawn theme)
- Slower pacing, calm and mindful feel
- Smooth, elegant transitions with gentle fade and scale effects
- ALL TEXT MUST BE CENTERED on screen using position preset "center"
- Bilingual text should appear as separate lines with proper spacing

This is a TEXT-ONLY video - no screenshots or app recordings.
Focus on typography, bilingual layout, timing, and gradient visual aesthetics.
begin.analysis_summary:
Text-only bilingual video for Begin daily guidance app.

Goal: Create a calm, mindful promo video with elegant bilingual text animations showcasing the daily guidance and journaling concept.

Style: Light and airy aesthetic with warm gradient backgrounds. Sunrise/dawn theme with soft golden-amber tones. Gradient backgrounds transitioning smoothly (e.g., #fef3c7 → #fde68a → #fbbf24).

Colors:
- Background: Light gradient (#fef3c7, #fde68a, #fbbf24)
- Primary accent: #f59e0b (amber)
- Secondary: #fbbf24 (golden)
- Text: #78350f (dark amber for contrast)

Typography: Inter/SF Pro with medium weights for readability. Bilingual text should be clearly separated or stacked.

Animation Style:
- Use "fade" and "scale" animations with "smooth" feel for elegant, calm transitions
- Avoid harsh cuts - use gentle fade exits
- Text should breathe - give each message time to be absorbed
- English and Chinese text should appear sequentially or stacked vertically

Layout Requirements:
- ALL text layers MUST use position preset "center" (never use custom x/y coordinates)
- For bilingual content, create separate text layers for English and Chinese
- Stack bilingual text vertically using y-offset from center (e.g., y: 45% for top line, y: 55% for bottom line)

Duration: ~15 seconds (slower pacing)
Pacing: Intro fade (1.5s) → Hero title EN/CN (3s) → Subtitle EN/CN (2.5s) → Feature 1 (2s) → Feature 2 (2s) → Slogan (3s) → Fade out (1s)

NO ASSETS AVAILABLE - create text-only clips with gradient background layers.
